programme.title: CONCACAF Champions League Soccer
programme.desc: Inter Miami CF scored twice in the second half to defeat Jamaican side Cavalier S.C. at Chase Stadium in the first leg matchup, 2-0, on March 6, as Tadeo Allende scored in the 61st minute and Luis Suárez added a goal in the 83rd minute.

programme.desc: Coverage of top-tier rugby in Australia and New Zealand.

programme.title: The Rover of Tobruk
programme.desc: The life of Bob Quinn was much more than becoming a legend and captain for the Port Adelaide Football Club, serving his country of Australia during World War II and receiving the Military Medal for his actions during the Siege of Tobruk.

programme.title: Saudi Pro League Soccer
programme.desc: Al-Ittihad claimed a 1-0 victory over Al-Riyadh in their first meeting of the season on Oct. 24 with a winning goal from N'Golo Kanté in the first half; Al-Ittihad posted 12 shots to Al-Riyadh's 9 while keeping 74 percent of possession.

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: Christopher Bell comes off back-to-back wins for the first time in his Cup Series career following his victory at Austin over William Byron; Bell averaged 103.568 mph en route to his win in the race last year, beating Chris Buescher by 5.465 seconds.

programme.title: The American Rodeo

programme.title: CONCACAF Beach Soccer Championship
programme.desc: Second round of group B matches at the 2025 Concacaf Beach Soccer Championship at the Malcolm Park Beach Soccer Facility in Nassau, Bahamas; the United States claimed its third Concacaf Championship in 2023 with a 5-0 win over Mexico in the final.

programme.title: ARCA Racing
programme.desc: Brenden Queen kicked off his rookie campaign with a win in the season opener at Daytona over William Sawalich to gain an early three-point lead; Sawalich averaged 86.142 mph en route to his win at Phoenix last year over Giovanni Ruggiero.
